content:
Rescuers got two more civilians who died as a result of rocket stroke of the Rushists in the Novogrodivka Donetsk region from March 21.

About thisinformsMinistry of Internal Affairs.

“Yesterday, the enemy struck the air strike in the city's residential sector. Two residents were under the rubble of the house. They could not be saved. The emergency officers seized the bodies of the dead and dismantled 15 tons of building structures, ”the message reads.

The work is now completed.

As reported by the Armyinform, RussiansThey hitBalism in Odesa region, a fire occurred at the site of hit.
title: In Novogrodivka got from under the rubble of the body of two victims of the Russian blow
